name: volcengine-tos
description: A sample MCP server for VolcEngine TOS that flexibly get objects from TOS.

examples.title: List Buckets
examples.description: Returns a list of all buckets owned by the authenticated sender of the request

examples.title: List Objects in a Bucket
examples.description: Returns some or all (up to 1,000) of the objects in a bucket with each request

examples.title: Get an Object
examples.description: Retrieves an object from volcengine TOS.
